body:
Syntax: cast 'teleport' <target>

Teleport instantly transports the target to a random location within the
same general area. This spell is useful for quick escapes but carries the
risk of landing in an unknown or dangerous location.

Classes: Mage
Level: 10
Mana Cost: 35
Position: Standing or Fighting

Unlike word of recall, teleport sends you to a random location rather than
a safe destination. Use with caution in dangerous areas.

See Also: WORD OF RECALL, SUMMON
